body:
CC: @fryeguy52, @bradking

Tag: snl-atdm-issue

After upgrading spack to version 0.13.0, cmake 3.15.4 + g++ 7.2.0, both built with spack, can not enable C++14 support using CMake code like:

```
target_compile_features(${DETECTION_LIBRARY} INTERFACE cxx_std_14)
```
title: GCC 7.2.0 and CMake 3.15.4 built with Spack 0.13.0 breaks CMake detection of C++14 support
